Description: Rim sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at top of rim, glazed streaky black below; top of rim glazed; exterior: at top, single dot band between lines; reserved below with dot rosette; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 717, no. 754)
Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. V, no. 19)
Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 302, no. 1097)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1095) (phase 2)
